name: Troy Air Experience
about: Troy Air Experience, LLC is a professional flight school and aircraft rental company established in 2007 in Michigan. Our mission is to provide student pilots with the latest aviation technology in a safety-minded environment, catering to each individual's learning needs. We offer a range of services, including flight instruction, aircraft rentals, and discovery flights starting at $129 for a half hour. Our instructors are highly experienced and dedicated to ensuring students feel confident and safe throughout their training. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction, we strive to make every flight experience exceptional. Contact us today to schedule your flight and take the first step towards achieving your aviation goals.
